submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        n=len(nums)
        a=[0]*(k+1)
        ax=[0]*(k+1)
        lt=0
        rt=n-1
        while lt<rt:
            a[abs(nums[lt]-nums[rt])]+=1
            b,c=min(nums[lt],nums[rt]), max(nums[lt],nums[rt]) 
            t=max(k-b,c)
            ax[t]+=1
            lt+=1
            rt-=1
        for i in range(1,k+1):
            ax[i]+=ax[i-1]
        ans=n
        for i in range(k+1):
            if i<=k/2:
                ans=min(ans, n/2-a[i])
                continue
            else:
                ans=min(ans, n/2-a[i]+ax[i-1])
        return ans
